text: It's so frustrating, so unfair that someone "tik tok" gives you "warnings" just because of his point of view. I posted a video of my martial arts academy, everything was made in a total martial art way and they gave me a warning!. And they gave me another warning because I posted a video of an Olympic gymnast fails an exercise.. I use my profile as a job and they just warned me and shadowbanned me!.. this is unfair.. really.. is not right!!!! And nobody answers to my messages! What a damage!!
